smoothness_description: Significant stutter and lag - below industry standards
summary: Overall scroll smoothness: Poor - Significant stutter and lag - below industry standards. Activity score: 20.49 (content movement level), Jerkiness: 17.66 (motion consistency, lower is better), Frame-time jitter: 84.28 ms (timing stability, target < 8ms for smooth), Estimated FPS: 7.8 (target: 60 FPS).
issues: High jerkiness (17.66): Scrolling motion is very uneven and jerky.
High frame-time jitter (84.28 ms): Significant frame timing variation causing stutter (target: < 16ms for 60 FPS).
Low frame rate (estimated 7.8 FPS): Below optimal 60 FPS target.
